name: Veecaloid Pop
description:
Soar into the stars with Milky, a "Veecaloid" modeled after superstar voice actress and singer, Cristina Vee!

Fans are raving in anticipation of Milky's celestial concert! But Milky must first harness COSMIC IDOL energy… while secretly charging up her MAGICAL GIRL alter-ego to defend the planet! Rapidly switch between modes to catch energy data, but don't mix them up or Milky will malfunction!

FEATURES:
- Hyper fun gameplay!
- Vocal music track: Cristina Vee - Milky Way (DJ Bouche Lightspeed Mix)
- Record scores and go for the top!
- Beautiful high resolution art by Linzb0t
- The voice talent of Cristina Vee! (Surprise!)

Seize the day — download Veecaloid Pop!

--

Song Credits
Title: Milky Way (DJ Bouche Lightspeed Mix)
Artist: Cristina Vee
Composer: Jason Miller
Lyrics: Cristina Vee and Jason Miller
Arranger/Remixer: DJ Bouche
